name: Ext_R3_ConceptMap_target
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.ConceptMap.target[x] for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents ConceptMap.target[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ConceptMap|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.definition: The target value set provides context to the mappings. Note that the mapping is made between concepts, not between value sets, but the value set provides important context about how the concept mapping choices are made.
element.comment: `ConceptMap.target[x]` maps to R4 `ConceptMap.target[x]`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ValueSet)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
